title.narrative: Strengthen public finance management and revenue collection in Federal Member States

description.narrative: This activity (Strengthen public finance management and revenue collection in Federal Member States) is a component of Public Resource Management in Somalia reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £14,019,090. This component benefits Somalia, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM), Domestic revenue mobilisation. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International. The start date is 30-04-2016 and the end date is 25-03-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
